name: Change font weight of heading element and verify the font weight value

attachments.name: Open website with URL: https://admin.shopify.com/store/quynhquynhiee/apps/rc-pagefly-1/pages

steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //h1[@class='Polaris-Header-Title']
==> The Text is: Pages

steps.name: Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Create a new PAGE page from blank
Click on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: page-blank

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: page-blank

steps.name: Wait for the page to be loaded
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Drag and drop Heading element to the editor

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.xpath: //button[@id='catalog--add-element-btn']

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: catalog--catalog-list--heading

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: catalog--catalog-list--heading

steps.name: Drag from element By.className: Catalog-Image to element By.cssSelector: iframe
Change font weight to 100 and verify selected element has the correct font weight
Get attribute aria-selected of element By.id: styling
Click on the element By.id: typo-more-setting-activator-btn

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: typo-more-setting-activator-btn

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: inspector--font-weight-selector

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: inspector--font-weight-selector

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: inspector--select--100

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: inspector--select--100

steps.name: Verify selected element has id b22bfb87-32da-4fec-8386-3c6a00519391 has css attribute font-weight with value 100
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Verify element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='b22bfb87-32da-4fec-8386-3c6a00519391'] with attribute font-weight has value is 100
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe

attachments.name: Selected Element ID: b22bfb87-32da-4fec-8386-3c6a00519391
